body_html:
Hi @ma0ho
Some updates from our side:

  1. This bug is due to one cudnn function didn't pick the correct internal kernel to call for backward filter conv. We have already filed a bug to NVIDIA.
  2. We are working on a workaround to improve the internal logic of conv ops to handle this case. I will let you know once the code is pushed to github repo.
body_text:
Hi @ma0ho

We are working on a workaround to improve the internal logic of conv ops to handle this case. I will let you know once the code is pushed to github repo.
body:
Hi @ma0ho 
Some updates from our side:
1) This bug is due to one cudnn function didn't pick the correct internal kernel to call for backward filter conv. We have already filed a bug to NVIDIA.
2) We are working on a workaround to improve the internal logic of conv ops to handle this case. I will let you know once the code is pushed to github repo.
